description.raw:
My fix for gazebo ABI jobs in pull request #778 broke ign-math:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=32)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/32/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/32/

The `USE_GCC6` variables get filled in before the script is run, so I changed the logic to not depend on updating `USE_GCC6` inside the script. Testing:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=33)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/33/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/33/
description.html:
My fix for gazebo ABI jobs in pull request #778 broke ign-math:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/32/

The USE_GCC6 variables get filled in before the script is run, so I changed the logic to not depend on updating USE_GCC6 inside the script. Testing:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/33/

title.raw: fix gcc6 logic when USE_GCC6 is unset
title.html: fix gcc6 logic when USE_GCC6 is unset
